          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">Displayed formula and name of the carboxylic acid formed on hydrolysis of propanenitrile</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Angezeigte Formel und Name der karboxylhaltigen 
Säure bildeten sich auf Hydrolyse von propanenitrile</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">La formule et le nom affichés de l'acide 
carboxylique ont formé sur l'hydrolyse de propanenitrile</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">A fórmula e o nome indicados do ácido carboxylic
deram forma no hydrolysis de propanenitrile</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">La formula ed il nome visualizzati dell'acido 
carbossilico hanno formato su idrolisi di propanenitrile</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Επιδειχθέντες τύπος και όνομα του καρβοξυλικού οξέος 
που διαμορφώνεται στην υδρόλυση propanenitrile</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">El fórmula y el nombre visualizados del ácido 
carboxylic formaron en la hidrólisis de propanenitrile</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">This illustration shows the displayed formula and name of the carboxylic acid formed when propanenitrile is hydrolyzed.</string>
          </description>
          <language>x-none</language>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">carboxylic acids</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">chemical reactions</string>
          </keyword>

          </keyword>

          </keyword>

          </keyword>

          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">reaction products</string>
          </keyword>
          <structure>
            <source>structureValues</source>
            <value>atomic</value>
          </structure>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Diese Abbildung zeigt die angezeigte Formel und 
den Namen der karboxylhaltigen Säure, die gebildet wird, wenn 
propanenitrile, wird hydrolysiert.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Cette illustration montre la formule et le nom 
affichés de l'acide carboxylique formé si propanenitrile est 
hydrolysée.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Esta ilustração mostra a fórmula e o nome 
indicados do ácido carboxylic dado forma quando propanenitrile 
hydrolyzed.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Questa illustrazione mostra la formula ed il nome 
visualizzati dell'acido carbossilico formato una volta propanenitrile 
è idrolizzata.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Αυτή η απεικόνιση εμφανίζει επιδειχθέντα τύπο και το 
όνομα του καρβοξυλικού οξέος διαμόρφωσε όταν propanenitrile 
υδρολύεται.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Esta ilustración muestra que el fórmula y el 
nombre visualizados del ácido carboxylic formaron cuando es 
propanenitrile está hidrolizado.</string>
          </description>
